ovdesc.p: An Online application, used to post the performance fees online.

desc.p: Specifies the VALUE.DATE of accounting entries.
Defines the status: Awaiting or Running or Processed.

p.p: When the record is authorised then the status will be moved to Awaiting.
While running, the service before posting the status will be moved to Running.
After posting the fees, the status will be moved to Processed.

desc.p: The record is amended only during Awaiting status.
Specifies the list of SEC.ACC.MASTER to post their performance fees online.
All portfolios belonging to this account officer would be selected to post performance fees online.
Contains the value as Yes or No.
If it is Yes, then all the portfolios are selected to post the performance fees online.
